summary: The implementation provides a comprehensive construction monitoring dashboard with all core React components and pages. The Login, Dashboard, Upload Progress, and Project Details pages are implemented with appropriate UI components (Card, Button, Alert, Sidebar). All components use Tailwind CSS with deep blue (#1e3a8a) and gray color schemes. Mock data is used throughout. Components are functional and organized in a structured folder hierarchy. The diff shows complete implementation of all seven requirements with appropriate routing, responsive design, and reusable component architecture.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'No backend logic or integration required' as a constraint and 'Backend API integration' as a non-goal. An empty backend actor file was created unnecessarily.

The BuildRequest lists 'User authentication logic' as a non-goal. The implementation includes useInternetIdentity hook and InternetIdentityProvider with full authentication client logic, which was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query integration for data fetching
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies 'Real data fetching or persistence' as a non-goal and requires only mock data. QueryClient and useQuery implementations suggest real data fetching capabilities beyond the mock data requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer with Caffeine.ai branding and copyright
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested a footer component or external branding. This appears to be additional content not specified in the BuildRequest.
